title: Lithuanian stores change parent company, but not owners
description:
The Spanish company that took over the Mere store chain in Lithuania is owned by the same three Russian citizens who were previously associated with the banned retail chain in Poland.

According to the Spanish company register, 79% of Vigalight, registered in Barcelona last year, is owned by Sergei ...

title: SEB cuts Lithuania's 2025 GDP growth forecast, expecting better 2026
description:
VILNIUS, Nov. 11 (Xinhua) -- SEB, one of the largest commercial banks in Lithuania, has cut down its forecast for the country's 2025 growth by 0.2 percentage points to 2.5 percent, according to the bank's Nordic Outlook review published on Tuesday.

For the next year, the Lithuanian economy expects ...

title: Lithuania's FM urges deeper EU-Türkiye ties in security, defense
description:
Lithuania’s Foreign Minister Kestutis Budrys stated on Thursday that the European Union must strengthen its defense partnerships and enhance closer cooperation with Türkiye against emerging threats.

Speaking to Anadolu Agency (AA), Budrys said that while Europe has boosted military spending in rece...
